core_balloon_pkg_version_error: Denne Baggrund skal bruge en nyere udgave af Wallpaper Engine. Venligst opdater Wallpaper Engine til den sidste udgave på Steam.
core_balloon_wallpaper_file_missing: Denne baggrund kan ikke åbnes da filen mangles.
core_msgbox_prompt_high_contrast_was_ena: Windows har fornyligt anvendt et ny 'Høj kontrast' tema hvilket gør Wallpaper Engine ikke fungerer.
core_msgbox_aero_failure:
Fejl ved aktivering af Aero.

It Det ser ud til at Windows forhindrer Aero fra at aktiveres. Desværre er dette kritisk for Wallpaper Engine, og kan ikke bruges foruden .

 prøv at aktivere Aero i selve Windows tema indstillinger og start Wallpaper Engine igen.
core_msgbox_ui_file_not_found:
Programmets filer kan ikke åbnes.

 Du har muligvis ugyldige tegn i installationsvejen, filerne mangler måske eller programmet kan være blokeret af et anti-virus.

 prøv geninstallering af Wallpaper Engine i samme directory som Steam, eller lav et Steam bibliotek med simple tegn.
core_updater_headline_init_complete: Færdiggjorde opsætning af udgave {{version}}. Starter Wallpaper Engine...
core_updater_headline_update_complete: Færdiggjorde opsætning til udgave {{version}}. Starter Wallpaper Engine...
core_updater_status_closing_processes_er: Fejlede opdagelse af allerede eksisterende processer
core_updater_status_distro_prepare_error: Boost fejl mens scanning af oprindelses directory {{error}}
core_updater_status_distro_copy_error: Boost fejl mens kopiering af filer {{error}}
core_updater_status_verify_failed_messag:
It looks like some files for Wallpaper Engine could not be installed. This can happen due to download errors in [[[Platform]]] or anti-virus programs falsely detecting files and causing problems. If you have an anti-virus besides Windows Defender, make sure that it does not interfere with [[[Platform]]] and Wallpaper Engine.

Make sure the application is closed while updating (close through tray icon or Task Manager if necessary) and no anti-virus is preventing your computer from working correctly.

If your anti-virus deleted files of Wallpaper Engine, you need to restore them and whitelist the path of Wallpaper Engine so the anti-virus stops deleting random files.
core_updater_status_compat_message_box_b:
You have the following applications running that may cause Wallpaper Engine to crash or make your system unstable. They inject code into Wallpaper Engine that causes issues. Make sure to add Wallpaper Engine to their exclusion list by adding wallpaper32.exe and wallpaper64.exe there.

{{list}}
core_updater_status_cancelled: Process has been cancelled by the user
core_updater_status_corrupted_system_mod: System file is missing or broken

Your system is broken or it's missing files. Wallpaper Engine cannot work unless your computer is correctly installed. This is an issue with your Windows and it's not an error in Wallpaper Engine.

Try fixing your computer by following these steps:

- First, delete these files through Windows Explorer:
{{modules}}
core_updater_prompt_close: Wallpaper Engine is still running, please close it first. Waiting for these processes to close:
core_updater_prompt_close_foreign: Wallpaper Engine cannot continue updating because a program appears to be locking the files. Please close these programs to continue:
core_updater_status_directx_not_supporte:
It appears that your graphics card does not support DirectX 10 or that your graphics driver has an issue. DirectX 10 is a system requirement for this application to work correctly.

If your graphics card is supposed to support DirectX 10, your current graphics driver could just be damaged. You can try reinstalling the driver or getting in touch with the vendor of your hardware (Nvidia, AMD, Intel) to solve this.
